name: Dragons Gorge
description:
Explore a randomly generated cave system for gems and gold to feed to a greedy dragon. This was made by the Weight Gaming staff with help from Hisano for the 3rd annual Weight Gaming Gain Jam.

Special thank you to Toby Larone for the name!

!!! WARNING: The linux and mac builds are untested!!!

Controls:

  • Movement - WSAD/Arrow Keys
  • Mine Block - hold left mouse button on block
  • Interact - E

Credits:

  • Kilif - Concept/Tile Assets
  • Psyko - Character Artist
  • Hisano - Sound/Music
  • Juxtaterrestrial - Writing/Dialog
  • Grotlover2 - Programing/PM

Check us out on weight gaming:

https://forum.weightgaming.com/t/dragons-gorge/11261
